name: Math Defender (Bruno Nova)
description:
Math Defender

A maths game, where you must defend your place from the falling bombs for as long as you can.

In each round a mathematical operation is shown at the top of the screen, and 4 numbered bombs will fall from the top.
You have to shoot the bomb that correctly answers the operation with your, and you have 2 shots available per round.
The other 3 bombs are decoys.

The game has 5 difficulty levels and 5 speed levels.

Playable on the browser, and can also be downloaded for Windows, Linux and Android.

Controls

  • Move the turret: press the arrow keys on the keyboard, the d-pad button on the joystick, or click or touch the area that a bomb is falling (will also shoot).
  • Shoot: press Space or Enter on the keyboard, A on the joystick or click or touch the area that a bomb is falling (will move the turret to that area before shooting).
  • Pause: press Escape on the keyboard, Start on the joystick or click or touch the "II" button on the top right corner.
  • Toggle fullscreen: press F11 on the keyboard, or click or touch on the respective button in the main menu.
